template_data.name: Shan Skar

document_data.caption: A map showing Shan Skar in northern Khazari.
document_data.name: Shan Skar
document_data.mainbody: '''Shan Skar''' was a prominent peak of [[Katakoro Shan]] found in [[Khazari]].
document_data.Geography: The peak sat high in the northwestern corner of the country near [[Manass]].
document_data.Description: Given the narrow breadth of Katakoro Shan in that region, Shan Skar's altitude of {{SI|15000|ft}} gave it an impressive view of Khazari as well as the [[Quoya Desert]].
